settings.content: We wanted to make sure that every brand didn't have your website and that your theme was as unique as you. ❤️

settings.label: Key
settings.info: Your license key is provided with your purchase via email.

settings.label: Background Video
settings.info: Upload your video to files and copy and paste + .mp4 (Must be MP4 to work)

settings.content: This applies to the Password Popup, best to have the Password Entry Editor from the Password Page enabled.

settings.label: Background Video
settings.info: Upload your video to files and copy and paste + .mp4 (Must be MP4 to work)

settings.label: Background Video
settings.info: Upload your video to files and copy and paste + .mp4 (Must be MP4 to work)

settings.label: Background Image
settings.info: Leave Empty To Display Page Background Color

settings.label: Background Position (X)
settings.info: Move The Position Of Your Image On The X Axis (Left & Right)

settings.label: Background Position (Y)
settings.info: Move The Position Of Your Image On The Y Axis (Up & Down)

settings.label: Enable Overlay
settings.info: Applies A Black Overlay To Your Background Image.

settings.label: Opacity
settings.info: Hit Save To See Your Changes

settings.content: Once enabled, a new section will appear and become editable on the appropriate screen (Homepage, Password, Etc).
Enable to hide the footer when the Enter Screen is enabled. (Homepage only)
This changes all the buttons on the website
Headers for Collections, Cart, and Blog

settings.label: Enable Custom Cursor
settings.info: This will replace the default cursor, transparent PNG files work best.

settings.label: This is a center click cursor
settings.info: Enable this option if your cursor is meant to be clicked in the center, e.g. a crosshair.

settings.label: SMS + Email EMBED
settings.info: Install your favorite SMS and Email Marketing app and simply copy and paste the embed code to have appear throughout your site.
